meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a pig in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: His piggishness at the dinner table was evident as he devoured his food noisily.
meanings.sent2: Her piggishness was apparent when she refused to share her snacks with anyone.
meanings.sent3: The piggishness of the raccoon raiding the trash cans was both annoying and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The piggishness of the bully's behavior left a sour taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent5: The piggishness of the toddler's messy eating habits made quite a memorable impression.
meanings.sent6: Despite his piggishness, he was still a lovable character in the story.
meanings.sent7: The piggishness of the student hogging all the crayons upset the teacher.
meanings.sent8: The piggishness of the squirrel hoarding nuts for winter was quite impressive.
meanings.sent9: The piggishness of the cat eating all the treats left the dog disappointed.
meanings.sent10: The piggishness of the child grabbing all the toys was hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being greedy or selfish in a manner reminiscent of a pig.
meanings.sent1: Her piggishness in taking all the credit for the project was unfair to the team.
meanings.sent2: The businessman's piggishness in exploiting his workers for profit was despicable.
meanings.sent3: The piggishness of the politician accepting bribes was both shameful and predictable.
meanings.sent4: The piggishness of the corporation prioritizing profits over employee well-being was alarming.
meanings.sent5: The piggishness of the landlord raising rent prices during a crisis was heartless.
meanings.sent6: Despite his piggishness, he still managed to win the community's trust.
meanings.sent7: The piggishness of the company cutting corners to save money backfired in the end.
meanings.sent8: The piggishness of the child refusing to share toys upset the other kids.
meanings.sent9: The piggishness of the customer demanding special treatment was unreasonable.
meanings.sent10: The piggishness of the celebrity demanding VIP treatment was off-putting.
